Auth.description: Enhanced media management platform for medias.unamur.be

apiKeyTutorial.title: Where can I find my API key ?
apiKeyTutorial.info: The API key allows you to log into MediaServer. You only have to give it once.
apiKeyTutorial.warning: Never send this key to anyone ! Whoever has this key can act on your behalf on MediaServer.
steps: Go to to your {MediaServer account settings}.
Click on the "Display my API key" button.
Copy the key and paste it in the field above.

errors.apiKeyNoLongerValid: The API key linked with your account is no longer valid. Please contact your MediaServer administrator or create a new account with another key.

Error404.pageNotFound: The page you're trying to reach does not exist.
